en-US.summary: Learn about the history of bitcoin.
examplePhrases: Alexa open history of bitcoin facts
Alexa ask history of bitcoin for a fact
Alexa tell history of bitcoin to tell me trivia
en-US.name: History of Bitcoin
en-US.description:
Ask for History of Bitcoin facts, and learn about the history of bitcoin.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch History of Bitcoin Facts" or "Alexa, open History of Bitcoin Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
